name: CLEO Grand Theft Auto Mod File
summary: Learn about .CLEO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CLEO plugins should be installed to the \​CLEO\​ directory within the GTA SA installation directory. When the game runs at startup, the CLEO library scans for plugins and runs them.
IniFiles.cleo: contains opcodes that can be used in INI files.
FileSystemOperations.cleo: stores opcodes for operating on files and folders.
IntOperations.cleo: enables logical operators, such as AND, OR, and XOR.

description: Plugin file used as part of the CLEO library, which is used for executing modifications to some Grand Theft Auto series games; stores a library in the Dynamic Link Library (.DLL) format and enables "opcodes" which can be scripted to alter game content.
